methods.javadoc: Returns the type as a string
methods.name: getTypeString
methods.comment: Returns the type as a string

methods.javadoc:
Returns Icon associated with this type or null if one has not been 
 set by a plugin.
methods.name: getIcon
methods.comment:
Returns Icon associated with this type or null if one has not been 
 set by a plugin.

methods.javadoc:
Returns marker color associated with this type or null if one has not been 
 set by a plugin.
methods.name: getMarkerColor
methods.comment:
Returns marker color associated with this type or null if one has not been 
 set by a plugin.

methods.javadoc:
Returns marker priority associated with this type or -1 if one has not been 
 set by a plugin.
methods.name: getMarkerPriority
methods.comment:
Returns marker priority associated with this type or -1 if one has not been 
 set by a plugin.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if there is at least one bookmark defined for this type
methods.name: hasBookmarks
methods.comment: Returns true if there is at least one bookmark defined for this type

methods.javadoc: Returns the id associated with this bookmark type.
methods.name: getTypeId
methods.comment: Returns the id associated with this bookmark type.
